item.title: 워크 오프 더 어쓰(Walk Off The Earth) - Back in Bed
item.description:
You know the weekend wasn’t long enough
And the drinks weren’t strong enough
Now I’m thinkin’ about the two of us
I wanna do this again
You left your necklace
on my night stand(Night stand)
I wrote my number
on your right hand(Right hand)
Never been one for one-night stands
Text me let’s do this again
Hey are you up?
I just wanna tell you what I’m thinkin’ of
You me in my sheets
But we ain’t gotta sleep
‘Cause I just wanna get back in bed
Don’t know why we ever left
All I wanna do is
Get back in bed with you
I’m so obsessed goddamn
Your body’s blessed
All I wanna do is
Get back in bed with you
Went to work lookin’ like a mеss
‘Cause I don’t think we evеr slept
And I’m wishin’ we never left
I wanna do this again
Took a sweater from your bedroom floor
Replayin’ all the things we did before
And I miss you but you miss me more(Touche)
‘Cause I just wanna get back in bed
Don’t know why we ever left
All I wanna do is
Get back in bed with you
I’m so obsessed goddamn(I’m so obsessed)

I just wanna tell you what I’m thinkin’ of
You me birds bees

item.title: 워크 오프 더 어쓰(Walk Off The Earth) - happy stuff
item.description:
My twenty-first birthday
Came with a price to pay move out
And figure it all out right away
Gone are the carefree days
The memories fade away and now
Reality checks me every day

I can think of a hundred million
Things I’d rather do than be anxious
I’m broke as hell and
It’s gettin’ overwhelmin'

I just want
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love
Just wanna
Dance around clothes are off
Forget about all the not so happy stuff
That’s what I want
All day all night
I’ll deal with all the stress in another life
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love
That’s what I want

Been makin’ some big mistakes
Ran outta time to waste and now
Nobody left to bail me out
It feels like I’m up again
Headaches from my sleeplessness

But mamma thinks I’m capable as hell
That’s so hard a credit for myself

‘Cause I just want
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love
Just wanna
Dance around clothes are off
Forget about all the not so happy stuff
That’s what I want
All day all night
I’ll deal with all the stress in another life
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love

I can think of a hundred million
Things I’d rather do than be anxious
I know someday it’ll all catch up to you

I just want
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love(Happy love)
Just wanna
Dance around clothes are off
Forget about all the not so happy stuff
That’s what I want
All day all night
I’ll deal with all the stress in another life
Happy thoughts happy friends
Happy songs happy love
That’s what I want

All day all night
It’s all I wanna think about
All day all night
Just think about the happy stuff
